mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id AS orderId, u.email AS userEmail, o.total_amount AS totalAmount, COUNT(oi.id) AS itemCount, o.order_date AS orderDate FROM orders o JOIN user u ON u.id = o.user_id JOIN order_item oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} GROUP BY o.order_id, u.email, o.total_amount, o.order_date ORDER BY o.order_date DESC
